com.github.koshamo.fiddler

Class ExitEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.koshamo.fiddler.Event
      • com.github.koshamo.fiddler.ExitEvent

  • public class ExitEvent
extends Event
    The exit event is a event, that is distributed to all modules registered to the message bus and calls their shutdown method. This event triggers a regular application shutdown process and all modules have the ability to do what they need to do before application exit, e.g. stop threads, writing data etc.
    Author:
    Dr. Jochen Ra√üler
